channel.title: Dungeoneering/Slaying/Skilling teams?
channel.description:
I've got like 15 friends on RS, half of which are offline all the damn time. But I need teams for better XP, and to make skilling less boring.
A team for skilling essentially is just a bunch of people that work on skills together and chat.
My dungeoneering is in fact my lowest skill, sitting at 49, and I'd like to get that up.
My slayer is 71, and again, I want to get that up. Slaying in teams is a lot more fun.
My RSN is: Blame0bama. That's a zero, not an o.

item.title: Dungeoneering/Slaying/Skilling teams?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Tutorial, post:12, topic:484114”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=602350.msg4223542#msg4223542 date=1360898457]

Rsn is Frank’s Mad. I’ll usually do PvM and some dungeoneering.

Wouldn’t it be Franks Mad… There’s no apostrophe’s in player names
[/quote]yup

I’ll add you when I hop on again.

Guys, we need to do some dungeoneering.

-Someone that can make higer level items in smith would be lovely.

Also. When the fudge did they make it so level 50 can bind 3 items? It used to be only 2.

It’s been that way for a while now.[/quote]

Well, last time I did dungeoneering (or read the guide I should say) it was only 2. lol. I just read the guide when I hit 50.

Read full topic
